name: Wheels of Duty
description:
Fight Against other players online across multiple locations with multiple game modes.

Set in a world where a deadly virus has caused everyone to lose their ability to use there legs, players must roll around in there wheel chairs and fulfill there duty as a soldier and claim victory on the battle ground.

Wheels of Duty Contains multiple game modes
Team Death Match - utilize different guns and abilities to your advantage and fight in a team to defeat you enemy.

Free for All - every one is your enemy, put them in there graves first.

Gun Game - like free for all but you must progress through all the guns in the game by killing your enemies to win.

Zombies - Band together in a group of up to 4 player to survive against zombies in rounds of increasing difficulty
